snippet: Representative Edward J. Markey of Massachusetts told the Federal Trade Commission that he found the advertisements disturbing because they were often made to appeal to younger people.
abstract: Representative Edward J Markey of Massachusetts tells Federal Trade Commission that he found advertisements for highly caffeinated energy drinks like 5-Hour Energy, Monster Energy and Rockstar Energy disturbing because they were often made to appeal to younger people.
lead_paragraph: Representative Edward J. Markey of Massachusetts told the Federal Trade Commission that he found the advertisements disturbing because they were often made to appeal to younger people.

headline.seo: Markey Presses F.T.C. to Investigate Energy Drink Ads
headline.main: F.T.C. Urged to Review Energy Drink Advertising
headline.print_headline: F.T.C. Urged To Review Energy Drink Advertising
